data.actual_result: Discord doesn't want my cat faces, and attempts to turn :3 into 🔢
data.expected_result: Discord doesn't attempt to turn your :3 into 🔢
data.short_description: Autocomplete attempts to autocomplete less than 2 characters, not allowing me to `:3` easily anymore
data.steps_to_repro: - Attempt to use any type of text emoticon consisting of standard unicode, such as \`:3\`, \`:7\`, and other things that people use on a daily basis
